template_input_params.name: ibmcloud_api_key
template_input_params.label: IBM Cloud API Key
template_input_params.description: Indicate the IBM Cloud API key to use

template_input_params.name: ibmcloud_region
template_input_params.label: IBM Cloud Region (e.g., us-south)
template_input_params.description: Indicate which IBM Cloud region to connect to

template_input_params.name: ibmcloud_zone
template_input_params.label: IBM Cloud Zone (e.g., us-south or  eu-de-1)
template_input_params.description: Indicate the zone within the region to connect to (only needed for multi-zone regions--e.g., eu-de-1)

template_input_params.name: power_instance_id
template_input_params.label: Power Virtual Server Instance ID
template_input_params.description: Power Virtual Server instance ID associated with your IBM Cloud account (note that this is NOT the API key)

template_input_params.name: ssh_key_name
template_input_params.label: Name of SSH Key in IBM Cloud for Login
template_input_params.description: SSH key name in IBM Cloud to be used for SSH logins

template_input_params.name: image_name
template_input_params.label: Name of Image to Deploy
template_input_params.description: Name of the image from which the virtual machine should be deployed

template_input_params.name: memory
template_input_params.label: Amount of Memory (GB)
template_input_params.description: Amount of memory (GB) to be allocated to the virtual machine

template_input_params.name: processors
template_input_params.label: Number of Virtual Processors
template_input_params.description: Number of virtual processors to allocate to the virtual machine

template_input_params.name: proc_type
template_input_params.label: Processor Type
template_input_params.description: Processor type for the LPAR - shared/dedicated

template_input_params.name: system_type
template_input_params.label: System on which to Deploy
template_input_params.description: Type of system on which the VM should be created - s922/e880

template_input_params.name: replicants
template_input_params.label: Number of virtual machines to Deploy
template_input_params.description: Number of virtual machine instances to deploy
